# HKCategoryValueAppleStandHour.idle

**Case**

The user didn’t stand up and move for at least one continuous minute during the sample.

## Declaration

```swift
case idle
```

## Constants

- **HKCategoryValueAppleStandHour.stood**: The user stood up and moved for at least one continuous minute during the sample.
